TopicTitle: When Approaching a Planetary Body Before Orbit but inside SOI, Intercept Indicators to a Targetted Orbiting Craft aren't Displayed.

Articles.Content:
KSP1 Version: 1.12.5.3190
KSP2 Version: 0.1.1.0.21572
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

KSP2 How it is:

Spoiler

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/TP4rICWQka8 (14 Seconds)

KSP1 How it was:

Spoiler

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/QzWBlhe2OHs (7 Seconds)

Work Around:

Spoiler

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/QylF5NB8lBw (21 Seconds)

Work around Steps:

  1. Change to Map View
  2. Focus on Mun
  3. Change to Craft Orbiting the Mun
  4. Set the other craft as Target
  5. Change to other Original Craft

Save File From KSP2 Videos:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/k6gmn6dom2nk12s/0120WithinMunSOIIntercept.zip?dl=0

Dres for Testing if Desired (Follow Aame Work Around Steps):
Save File For Dres:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/k8bratczzq6qao4/0120WithinDresSOIIntercept.zip?dl=0

Theory:
What I believe is happening for the work around is that the intercepts are being provided by the orbital craft.
If I change back to the orbital craft and unselect the incoming craft and change back again the intercepts are missing again.

Additional Information:

  • 0.1.1.0 has a few more steps but has the same issue as  0.1.2.0 for the most part.
  • Craft in Kerbin SOI that has an intercept with a craft around the Mun (within Mun SOI) cant be tested currently due to a bug with SOIs within SOIs (Mun inside Kerbin) missing PE etc.
  • Craft in Kerbin SOI that has an intercept with a craft around Duna (within Duna SOI) was tested and didn't work even with the work around.

Save File for SOI to SOI Intercept Indicators Testing:
Same Steps to attempt work around  (don't use the tracking station)
The Active vessel is the craft around Duna due to another bug causing issues.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/umezkfds319xj2u/KerbinSOItoDunaSOITestSave.zip?dl=0
